source.name: Excluded Parties List System (EPLS)
source.description: Now a part of the System for Awards Management (SAM) the EPLS is an electronic, web-based system that identifies those parties excluded from receiving Federal contracts, certain subcontracts, and certain types of Federal financial and non-financial assistance and benefits.  The EPLS keeps its user community aware of administrative and statutory exclusions across the entire government, and individuals barred from entering the United States.
